channel.title: 法新社
channel.description: 这是一个追踪法新社news的种子

item.title: 视频：智利律师贡萨洛-蒋（Gonzalo Chiang）和他的狗萨姆（Sam）在圣地亚哥圣克里斯托瓦尔山（Cerro San Cristobal）的山路上散步时收集塑料垃圾。蒋正在努力推广 "plogging"（慢跑时捡拾垃圾）的做法。
item.description:
VIDEO: Chilean lawyer Gonzalo Chiang and his dog Sam collect plastic waste as they walk the trails of Cerro San Cristobal in Santiago. Chiang is on a quest to promote the practice of "plogging" -- picking up litter while jogging. pic.twitter.com/8NwTM8j3iS

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 23, 2024

item.title: 视频：维奥莱特-查奇（Violet Chachki）是有史以来第一位在巴黎传说中的疯马歌舞厅跳舞的男性变装皇后，她希望自己的出现能帮助 "传播 "她自己从变装中获得的 "治疗"。
item.description:
VIDEO: Violet Chachki is the first male-bodied drag queen ever to dance at the fabled Crazy Horse cabaret in Paris, where she hopes her appearance will help "spread the therapy" she herself got from drag. pic.twitter.com/9K3Miy7Mk1

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 23, 2024

item.title: 香港新的国家安全法于周六生效，对叛国和叛乱等罪行的严厉惩罚立即生效，最高可判处终身监禁。
item.description:
Hong Kong's new national security law came into force on Saturday, putting into immediate effect tough penalties of up to life imprisonment for crimes including treason and insurrection.https://t.co/Gzg7cjGVTk

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 23, 2024

item.title: 视频：在巴米扬省的一个斜坡边缘，选手们轮流从山坡上滑下，互相加油打气，团结一致，共同维护阿富汗滑雪运动的生命力。
item.description:
VIDEO: From the edge of a slope in the province of Bamiyan, rivals cheer each other on as they take turns to race down the mountainside, united in keeping skiing alive in Afghanistan. pic.twitter.com/01PCpFns4E

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 23, 2024

item.title: 据美国媒体报道，法国作家兼插画家劳伦特-德-布鲁霍夫（Laurent de Brunhoff）去世时年仅 98 岁，他成功地续写了和蔼可亲的大象 "巴巴尔 "的冒险故事--这只大象最初只是他母亲的一个睡前故事，后来被改编成深受儿童喜爱的....。
item.description:
French author and illustrator Laurent de Brunhoff, who died at the age of 98 according to US media, successfully continued the adventures of the affable elephant "Babar" -- first imagined as a bedtime story by his mother, before being turned into a beloved children's character.…

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 23, 2024

item.title: 周六，威尔士王妃凯瑟琳以一段高度个人化的视频宣布了她令人震惊的癌症诊断结果，赢得了赞誉。
item.description:
Catherine, Princess of Wales, won plaudits Saturday for a highly personal video announcing her shock cancer diagnosis, which came just weeks after King Charles III revealed he too is battling the disease.https://t.co/Wq3adXzhmO

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 23, 2024

item.title: 视频：墨西哥人聚集在墨西哥城郊外的特奥蒂瓦坎前西班牙金字塔，参加庆祝春分的传统活动。
item.description:
VIDEO: Mexicans gather at the pre-Hispanic pyramids of Teotihuacan on the outskirts of Mexico City for a tradition that celebrates spring equinox. pic.twitter.com/hbZUnxdgjG

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 23, 2024

item.title: 在海军突击队夺回一艘被劫持的散装货轮并解救出数名人质后数天，印度于周六将 35 名被指控的索马里海盗带到孟买。
item.description:
India brought 35 accused Somali pirates to Mumbai on Saturday, days after they were apprehended when naval commandos recaptured a hijacked bulk carrier and rescued several hostages.https://t.co/RWZpF1zxqW

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 23, 2024

item.title: 视频："Change The Punchline！"是首次在布加勒斯特举办的为期一个月的全女性单口相声驻场演出。其目的是鼓励新一代罗马尼亚女性喜剧演员开启自己的职业生涯。
item.description:
VIDEO: Held for the first time, "Change The Punchline!" is a month-long all-female stand-up comedy residency in Bucharest. The aim: to encourage a new generation of female Romanian comedians to kick off their career. pic.twitter.com/aVKiyoJhxb

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 23, 2024

item.title: 三届世界冠军得主马克斯-维斯塔潘周六在澳大利亚大奖赛上连续第三次获得杆位，这位荷兰飞人的目标是创纪录的十连胜。
item.description:
Dominant three-time world champion Max Verstappen clinched a third straight pole of the season on Saturday at the Australian Grand Prix as the flying Dutchman targets a record 10th consecutive win.#AFPSports https://t.co/DXJz4vvida

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 23, 2024

item.title: 视频：在美国和库尔德部队宣布结束伊斯兰国组织的 "哈里发国 "五年之后，数千名与圣战分子有关联的人仍被困在贫困和暴力的火药桶中。
item.description:
VIDEO: Five years after US and Kurdish forces declared an end to the Islamic State group's "caliphate", thousands linked to the jihadists remain trapped in a tinderbox of deprivation and violence. pic.twitter.com/1MbLU6Z7IJ

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 23, 2024

item.title: 周六，三届世界冠军马克斯-维斯塔潘（Max Verstappen）在澳大利亚大奖赛（Australian Grand Prix）上连续第三次夺得杆位，"非常满意"。
item.description:
A "very satisfied" three-time world champion Max Verstappen clinched a third straight pole of the season on Saturday at the Australian Grand Prix as the flying Dutchman targets a record 10th consecutive win. https://t.co/aQ4AuqDfBE

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 23, 2024

#BREAKING US Senate leader announces vote to avert shutdown pic.twitter.com/P4Glq80TIt

item.title: #外交官：联合国安理会就加沙停火新文本的投票推迟至下周一
item.description:
#BREAKING UN Security Council vote on new Gaza ceasefire text postponed to Monday: diplomats pic.twitter.com/yIxZ23MgMn

item.description:
#BREAKING Captured Somali pirates arrive in India for trial: navy pic.twitter.com/A6uYrM8MwN

item.title: 在东耶路撒冷，里姆-阿布-奥贝达（Rim Abu Obeida）正在接受癌症放射治疗，她焦急地等待着。她是生活在困境中的一群巴勒斯坦病人之一，以色列法院正在权衡是否可以在治疗结束后将他们送回加沙。
item.description:
In east Jerusalem where she received radiation therapy for cancer, Rim Abu Obeida waits anxiously.

She is among a group of Palestinian patients living in limbo while an Israeli court weighs if they can be sent back to Gaza now that their treatment is over https://t.co/IBvHaA8Rfs pic.twitter.com/4WMXFyGZ3m

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 22, 2024

item.title: 直到最近，前政府内部人士彼得-马扎尔（Peter Magyar）才被公众所熟知，他突然出现在匈牙利的政治舞台上，誓言要挑战资深民族主义总理维克托-欧尔班（Viktor Orban）的 "权力工厂"。
item.description:
Largely unknown to the public until recently, former government insider Peter Magyar has burst onto the political scene in Hungary, vowing to challenge the "power factory" of veteran nationalist premier Viktor Orban https://t.co/4YUe7TctLE

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 22, 2024

item.title: 先是机枪扫射，然后是刺耳的惊恐尖叫，接着克罗克斯市政厅燃起熊熊大火。
item.description:
First there were rounds of machine gun fire, then piercing screams of panic and then the Crocus City Hall went up in flames.

Hundreds of fans had been at the hall north of Moscow for the concert before armed individuals entered and opened firehttps://t.co/vNjyBsxVb2 pic.twitter.com/ws5GLj9bgi

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 22, 2024

item.title: 根据一项提交给领导人峰会的计划，欧盟希望通过对进口到欧盟的谷物和相关产品征收 "禁止性关税"，"扼杀 "俄罗斯用于乌克兰战争的收入。
item.description:
The EU is looking to "choke off" revenue Russia uses for its war on Ukraine by slapping "prohibitive tariffs" on grain and related imports into the bloc, under a plan being put to a leaders summit https://t.co/FOfrZBU5lY

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 22, 2024

item.title: 世界花样滑冰锦标赛周五的节奏舞比赛中，卫冕世界冰舞冠军的美国选手麦迪逊-乔克（Madison Chock）和埃文-贝茨（Evan Bates）夺冠
item.description:
Defending world ice dance champions Madison Chock and Evan Bates of the United States won Friday's rhythm dance at the World Figure Skating Championships https://t.co/50Djh91SRR pic.twitter.com/TZIdyUbZOf

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 22, 2024

item.title: 耐克在其主导国际足球业务的长期斗争中取得了最令人吃惊的胜利之一，他们击败了阿迪达斯，成为德国的球衣供应商。
item.description:
Nike scored one of the most surprising victories in their long battle to dominate international football business when they outbid Adidas to become Germany's kit supplier https://t.co/eIObtVK3jk

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 22, 2024

item.title: #俄罗斯媒体称莫斯科商场袭击事件估计造成 40 人死亡，100 人受伤
item.description:
#BREAKING 40 estimated dead, 100 injured in Moscow mall attack, Russian media says pic.twitter.com/ginPpMPDQ7

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 22, 2024

item.title: 一个由地质学家组成的顶级专家小组在对 "人类时代 "开始的确切时间产生分歧后，决定不赋予 "人类时代 "在地球地质年表中的独特地位。
item.description:
A top panel of geologists has decided not to grant the 'human age' its own distinct place in Earth's geological timeline after disagreeing over when exactly our era might have begun https://t.co/2VdRNrfNpW pic.twitter.com/NJhK9zwlGc

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 22, 2024

item.title: 突发事件--在得知凯瑟琳王妃被诊断出癌症的 "可怕 "消息后，白宫@新闻发言人祝愿她早日康复
item.description:
Breaking - White House @PressSec wishes Princess Catherine swift recovery after 'terrible' news of cancer diagnosis

— Danny Kemp (@dannyctkemp) March 22, 2024

item.title: #威尔士王妃凯瑟琳宣布癌症诊断结果，令人震惊

item.title: 📷 瑞典滑雪运动员克里斯托弗-特德尔（Kristofer Turdell）在瑞士阿尔卑斯山举行的自由式滑雪世界巡回赛决赛韦尔比耶极限赛（Verbier Xtreme）上比赛。
item.description:
📷 Swedish skier Kristofer Turdell competes during the Freeride World Tour final Verbier Xtreme in the Swiss Alps pic.twitter.com/yYQupsfJJZ

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 22, 2024

item.title: 美洲人权法院就世界上污染最严重的城镇之一对秘鲁进行了谴责，这个安第斯城市拥有一个重金属冶炼厂，近一个世纪以来，该冶炼厂毒害了居民和环境
item.description:
The Inter-American Court of Human Rights condemned Peru over one of the world's most polluted towns, an Andean city which is home to a heavy metal smelter that has poisoned residents and the environment for almost a century https://t.co/Vzfaf4vt4P

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 22, 2024

item.title: #AFP 本周图片（3 月 16-22 日）
item.description:
#AFP PICTURES OF THE WEEK (March 16-22) https://t.co/oz4x76nN2G pic.twitter.com/lF98IozCY2

— AFP Photo (@AFPphoto) March 22, 2024

item.title: 维克多-夏拉（Victor Sharrah）一天早上醒来时，发现自己眼前到处都是恶魔。感谢优秀的维克多和 @avmello_ 向我讲述这种罕见的卡夫卡式病症--前视变形症--它扭曲了人脸的外观：
item.description:
When Victor Sharrah woke up one morning he saw demons everywhere he looked.
Thanks to the excellent Victor and @avmello_ for speaking to me about this rare Kafkaesque condition - prosopometamorphopsia - which distorts how faces appear.
My story for @AFP:https://t.co/iVext8qFCW

— Dan Lawler (@DanielLawler) March 22, 2024
